ags:resource.dc:title: Amendment of law and innovation of vehicle emission station

dc:title.dcterms:alternative: Novela zákona a inovace stanic měření emisí vozidel

dc:creator.ags:creatorCorporate: Czech University of Life Sciences Prague, Kamýcká 129, 165 21 Prague 6 – Suchdol, Czech Republic, e-mail: maruskova@tf.czu.cz

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: This article aims to design innovation of current vehicle emission station in connection with the new law no. 239/2013 Coll., what is valid from 1st January 2015. The article is concerned only with the part of the amendment, what is related to vehicle emission stations. The amendment revokes the certificate of emission measurement, follows up the certificate for the technician and the mechanic, the final exam, etc. but it does not include lots of more important and probably essential changes as the central database or the system of cameras or total change of methods of measuring the emissions of vehicle in operation carried out that they are discuss for lots of years. More stringent conditions at the emission stations or absolutely new, more stringent method of measuring the emissions of vehicle would help to reveal the bigger amount of vehicles that they produce unacceptable quantity of harmful emissions and they would help to decrease the negative impact connected with transportation.
